meaningMnemonic: In <kanji>secrecy</kanji> you must <kanji>announce</kanji> this information. It's not for anyone to hear, it's <vocabulary>secret information</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own. The みつ goes to みっ.
